text: When inspiration does not come to me, I go halfway to meet it.
author: Sigmund Freud

text: Success doesn't come to you…you go to it.
author: Marva Collins

text: Change the world by being yourself.
author: Amy Poehler

text: Every moment is a fresh beginning.
author: T.S Eliot

text: Everything you can imagine is real.
author: Pablo Picasso

text: The mind is everything. What you think you become.
author: Buddha

text: All limitations are self-imposed.
author: Oliver Wendell Holmes

text: Happiness depends upon ourselves.
author: Aristotle

text: Your time is limited, so don’t waste it living someone else’s life.
author: Steve Jobs

text: Life would be tragic if it weren’t funny.
author: Stephen Hawking

text: Love the life you live, and live the life you love.
author: Bob Marley

text: Life is a series of choices.
author: Nostradamus

text: There are only two ways to live your life. One is as though nothing is a miracle. The other is as though everything is a miracle.
author: Albert Einstein

text: Success is one percent inspiration, ninety-nine percent perspiration.
author: Thomas Edison

text: Success consists of going from failure to failure without loss of enthusiasm.
author: Winston Churchil

text: It does not matter how slowly you go so long as you do not stop.
author: Confucius

text: Twenty years from now you will be more disappointed by the things that you didn't do than by the ones you did do. So throw off the bowlines. Catch the trade winds in your sails. Explore. Dream. Discover.
author: Mark Twain

text: Life is far too important a thing ever to talk seriously about.
author: Oscar Wilde

text: Beauty is in the eye of the beholder.
author: Oscar Wilde

text: In the middle of difficulty lies opportunity.
author: Albert Einstein
